headline: Xcel Energy: Unique Positioning Among Close Peers
summary: Xcel Energy operates four vertically-integrated utilities across eight U.S. states, offering a balanced mix of electric and gas service. Read why I rate XEL stock as a hold.

headline: Xcel Energy looks to limit wildfire liability, tariff impacts
summary: Company leaders are calling for a federal solution to wildfire litigation as new theories emerge in cases against Xcel Energy in Colorado.

headline: Xcel Energy: Big Plans But At A Premium And Uncertainty Looms
summary: Xcel Energy maintains FY2025 EPS guidance despite Q1 misses. Explore its $45B renewable growth plan, stock performance, and future opportunities.
